responses: Hello! How can I assist you with SCI services today?
Hi there! What would you like to know about SCI?
Greetings! How can I help you with Shipping Corporation of India?
Welcome! I'm here to answer your questions about SCI.

patterns: What services are available at SCI?
Services provided by Shipping Corporation of India?
Which shipping services does SCI offer?
responses: SCI provides a range of services, including Tankers, Bulk Carriers, Container, Offshore, Break Bulk, Coastal & Passenger Services, and Chartering. You may request additional information regarding any of the aforementioned services.

patterns: What kind of tankers does SCI have?
Give me info about SCI's tankers
Types of tankers operated by SCI?
SCI crude or product tankers info
responses: SCI offers three types of tankers: Product, Crude, and Specialized Vessels. For detailed information, please refer to the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicedetails/tankers

patterns: Tell me about bulk shipping at SCI
What are SCI bulk vessel specs?
How many types of bulk carriers are there in SCI?
Bulk carrier capacity in SCI fleet?
responses: SCI is the leading Bulk Carrier operator in India, managing 15 vessels of Handymax, Supramax, Panamax, and Kamsarmax sizes, averaging 9 years in age (8-10 years range), designed for India centric trade with global cross-trading capability for diverse cargo like iron ore and coal. For detailed information, please refer to the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicedetails/bulk-carriers

patterns: Details about container shipping by SCI
responses: SCI offers two main types of container services Coastal Services and Overseas Services.You may request additional information regarding any of the aforementioned services.

patterns: What is included in coastal container shipping?
Can SCI ship between Indian ports?
responses: SCI provides high-quality domestic coastal shipping services that connect key Indian ports, supporting the Government of India’s Sagarmala initiative. For detailed information, please refer to the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicepage/sci-middle-east-india-liner-express-service

patterns: Tell me about SCI international container routes
Does SCI do global container shipping?
responses: SCI also offers extensive international container services with global reach through direct calls, slot sharing, and charter arrangements. For detailed information, please refer to the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicepage/indian-subcontinent-europe

patterns: What offshore vessels does SCI use?
responses: SCI provides vital marine logistics support to the Indian oil industry for offshore exploration and operations. To check offshore vessel availability, please refer to the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicepage/vessel-availability

SCI is the only Indian shipping company offering overseas Liner Break-bulk services for import and export of over-dimensional, heavy lift, and containerized cargo worldwide. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicedetails/break-bulk

patterns: Booking travel to Andaman with SCI?
Is there a passenger route by SCI?
responses: SCI operates domestic coastal shipping services on behalf of the Government of India, connecting key Indian ports.For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicedetails/overview-coastal-passenger-services. Passenger and cargo tickets for travel to and from the Andaman & Nicobar Islands are booked by the Andaman & Nicobar Administration, with details available on the A&N website: https://www.andaman.gov.in/

patterns: How do I charter a vessel through SCI?
responses: SCI's Chartering Department manages in/out chartering of all types of vessels, ensuring efficient vessel procurement through established broking channels and procedures. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicedetails/chartering

SCI offers end-to-end technical consultancy for shipbuilding and vessel acquisition, supporting government and institutional clients with expert guidance on feasibility, design, project execution, and delivery. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicedetails/shipbuilding-consultancy

patterns: When is the next SCI vessel?
Where can I see shipping calendar?
responses: SCI’s Vessel Schedule solution is designed to meet future logistics needs by enabling users to efficiently search and track cargo movement through intuitive selection of loading and discharge ports, along with preferred date or week range. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/vessel_schedule

patterns: How can I track a shipment?
Is there a way to trace my cargo?
responses: SCI provides various tracking facilities for Container Track, Bill of Lading, Booking Reference No. and Bill Tracking. You may request additional information regarding any of the aforementioned tracking.

patterns: How do I trace my container?
responses: You can track your container here: https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/track_trace
Track your Bill of Lading here: https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/track_trace

patterns: Where can I see my SCI invoice?
responses: Track your bills effortlessly by entering the Vendor Number, SCI Reference Number, or Purchase Order Number. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/bill_trace
Use your Booking Reference Number to track here: https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/track_trace

SCI offers three easily accessible tariff options:- Detention/Demurrage Tariff, Terminal Handling Charges (THC) and Chennai Import Charges. You may request additional information regarding any of the aforementioned tariffs.
Check import/export tariffs and charges by selecting your sector and region, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicesubpage/detention-demurrage-tariff/8

patterns: What does SCI charge for THC?
responses: Terminal Handling Charges info: https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicesubpage/thc/8

patterns: What are SCI import rates in Chennai?
responses: Chennai import charges: https://www.shipindia.com/services/servicepage/chennai-import-charges
SCI's agency network: https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/agency_network
SCI maintains two subsidiaries, namely Inland & Coastal Shipping Ltd. (ICSL) and SCI's Bharat IFSC Limited. You may request additional information regarding any of the aforementioned Subsidiaries.

Inland & Coastal Shipping Ltd. (ICSL), a wholly owned subsidiary of SCI to provide transportation services through inland waterways, coastal shipping, and end-to-end logistics. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/page/icsl_page

patterns: What is SCI Bharat IFSC Ltd.?
responses: SCI's Bharat IFSC Limited, a subsidiary of The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd., operates as a Government of India enterprise focused on providing specialized financial and shipping-related services. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/page/sci_bharat_ifsc_limited/

patterns: How can I work for SCI?
responses: The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) offers career opportunities for Shore Personnel and Fleet Personnel. You may request additional information regarding any of the aforementioned career options.
For Fleet Personnel careers and results, visit: https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/fleet_personnel and https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/fleetresult
For Shore Personnel jobs and information, visit: https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/shore_growth_story

patterns: Where to find SCI procurement info?
responses: The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) provides detailed information on procurement activities for various departments, including Purchase & Services, Services Contracts Cell, and Insurance Cell. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/frontcontroller/tenderpage/overview

The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd.(SCI) provides comprehensive contact details for its Corporate Office located at Shipping House, 245 Madame Cama Road, Mumbai - 400021, along with phone number 022-22026666, and includes sections for Human Resources, Finance Division, Purchase & Stores, Information Technology, Vigilance, Bulk Carriers & Tankers, Technical & Offshore, Liner & Passenger Services, Maritime Training Institute, Regional Offices, and WIM Details. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/page/contact/b-t

The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) offers detailed information under the Scheme of Arrangement for Demerger, including sections for Information for Shareholders, AGM, Postal Ballot, Unclaimed Shares/Dividend, Downloads, Company Secretary, and Registrars, as well as disclosures under Regulation 46 and Investor Relations. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/investors/scheme_of_arrangement_for_demerger

patterns: How to register as SCI vendor?
responses: The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) provides options for vendor registration and a list of banned vendors. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/banvendor/banvendorpage/banreg

The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd. (SCI) provides access to information under the RTI Act, 2005, enabling citizens to seek details about its operations and services. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/rti/rtipage/rti-act-2005

SCI demonstrates its commitment to social responsibility through impactful CSR initiatives aligned with the Companies Act, 2013, focusing on sustainable development and community welfare. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/csr/csrpage/overview. Details of CSR Committee Members are available on https://www.shipindia.com/page/committees

Access the latest financial performance and annual reports of The Shipping Corporation of India Ltd., a Government of India enterprise committed to excellence in maritime services. For detailed information, please refer the https://www.shipindia.com/investors/quarterlyresults

patterns: Where can I follow SCI news?
responses: Stay connected with SCI!
